name: Fluff's New Family
description:
Care for a cute bunny named Fluff who is the newest addition to your family. A virtual pet game made with Construct 2.

This game was made for a game jam from September 29th to October 1st in 2017. The theme was "family."

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
